name: Tourist
description: Tourist Token (TOTO) is the blockchain rewards and loyalty platform for a tourism market. TOTO is built on top of the Ethereum blockchain. The TOTO token will be used to rewards in tourism market. Travelers receives TOTO token by make contents, take pictures, review and rating products, restaurants, food and post it on our website. Manufacturers, advertisers buy TOTO token and pay for travelers by their posts, reviews and comments. TOTO is based on reviews because they are one of the most helpful and trustworthy information found on the internet. On top of that, reviews and star ratings are directly related with business revenue. This makes reviews a perfect example where information should be monetized by the creator, not only the business. With TOTO, travelers will have a place to display and directly monetize their content. And through TOTOâ€™s platform, they will have the ability to spread awareness about their content and increase their social reach.
